subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ma|t=not}}. Cognate with {{och-l|亡|to disappear}}. The voiceless initial is possibly from the devoicing effect of an early (i.e. Proto-Sino-Tibetan) causative prefix ''*s-'' on [[亡]] (i.e. [[w:Proto-Sino-Tibetan|PST]] ''*s-maŋ'' > ''*hmaŋ'' > [[w:Middle Chinese|Middle Chinese]] hwɑŋ) which was subsequently lost.
